Job Description: Job Description     Overall, 3 to 4 years of software development experience in Microsoft .NET technologies.   Experience with Entity Framework hibernate or any other ORM.   Hands on with .NET programming skills (.NET Framework 4.x, C# 5 or later, ASP.NET, WCF, ASP.NET MVC, ADO.NET, Entity Framework, IIS, SQL Server 2008 R2 or later).   Good understanding of OOAD.   Handson experience in JavaScript, HTML5, jQuery, jQuery Mobile, AngularJS, Knockouts and CSS3 is added advantage.   Design and develop web services using WCF and Web API.   Designing database, tables, indexes, stored procedure, views, etc., with good insights into performance optimization techniques.   Develop unit and scenario based automated test cases for .NET class libraries using NUnit or MS Unit test Framework.   Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies.     Experience:   3-4 Years     Qualification:   BTech/BS/BE/MTech/MS/ME from a reputed engineering institute
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, Any Graduate in Any Specialization
